Can it be added to load additional settings files. (business environment)
For example we use the user.js file, but could we also use:
user.js
user-1.js
user-xjx.js

Same for 
userChrome.css
userChrome-fonts.css
userChrome-blah.css

That way business can separate out specific settings whilst allow for extra customization based on different user groups for example.  Another would be to all an 'include' setting in the normal files to allow specifying addtional files to load.

Reproducible: Always
